backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, and access control with storage mixins and ordered maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two Giphy‑related frontend fixes tied to AvatarPickerDialog with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing routing, UI components, hooks, and chat features.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root app configuring TanStack Router routes, layout, 404 handling, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar picker dialog with image upload, Giphy search using debounced input, request‑ID tracking, and avatar update actions.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat area handling message fetching, auto‑scroll, replies, pinned video, and expandable header UI.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card with dynamic media thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter, including live-status and preview fetching.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a modal dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category, and optional media via uploads, video URLs, or Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with attribution and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with navigation, username editing, avatar selection, and back-to-lobby behavior.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component that intentionally renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays individual chat messages with reactions, media embeds, timestamps, replies, and pin/unpin actions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Handles composing and sending messages with optional image upload, video URLs, Twitter links, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video for a chatroom with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, progress tracking, and synchronized playback behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for handling Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for chatrooms, search, filtering, and message-related operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions including CSS variables for light/dark modes and global layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Defines frontend constants for Giphy API key and result limits.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utility to format numbers into compact notation like k, M, or B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Wrapper for Giphy search API returning parsed GIF metadata and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty placeholder module for html2canvas loading.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder module for rendering Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and caches Twitter oEmbed data, extracting safe preview fields like author, text, and images.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with validation, versioning, and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file for Twitter thumbnail logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file for caching Twitter thumbnails.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Provides utilities for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail or embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, handles loading/error states, increments view count, and renders ChatArea.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays chatroom listings with search and category filters and supports creating new chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, containers, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking issues, features, and state related to fixing Giphy search behavior.
